mapper.select: SELECT USERID AS userid, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, ADDR AS addr FROM MEMBER ORDER BY userid ASC LIMIT #{start}, 3

SELECT USERID AS userid, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, ADDR AS addr FROM MEMBER WHERE ${column} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY userid DESC LIMIT #{start}, 2
SELECT USERID AS userid, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, ADDR AS addr FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{userid}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM MEMBER
